# ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType.browser

**Case**

A notice type that indicates your app displays external purchases in a destination of your choice.

## Declaration

```swift
case browser
```

## Discussion

After displaying a notice with this notice type using [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ExternalPurchaseCustomLink/showNotice(type:)], if the customer chooses to continue, the app goes to the background and presents external purchases in a destination outside of the app.

## Getting notice types

- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType.withinApp**: A notice type that indicates that you display the destination in a web view or native experience within the app.
